==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Ehsan:''' Hello, are you a guest invited by the Lord? Do you need help with your luggage?
:{{DIcon}} About the Lord...
::'''Ehsan:''' Oh, you're here to pay the Lord a visit? Then please inquire about it with the butler.
::'''Ehsan:''' I'm just hired by the butler to carry goods. To be honest, I haven't even met the Lord myself, so I really can't help. Sorry.
:{{DIcon}} Not at the moment.
::'''Ehsan:''' Alright, let me know if you need me.
{{Dialogue End}}
